name: HTML
text: I work with the building blocks of web pages.

name: CSS
text: Styling is my game, whether it's plain CSS or spiced up with Tailwind for that extra flair.

name: JavaScript
text: From vanilla basics to making websites do cool things.

name: React
text: Diving into the React world, turning static websites into dynamic playgrounds.

name: SQL
text: I've learnt the fundamentals to communicate with databases.

name: API
text: No stranger to the world of fetching data from APIs. Harry Potter summoned a brum with ACCIO and I use Axios to summon data! Or a regular fetch.

name: Redux
text: I've had my fair share of wrestling with state management.

name: TypeScript
text: So far only theoretical knowledge but give me time!
